title: The Newcomer
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media and Abram Murray
brief_description: What happens when a new student comes into the class? The first segment shows David, the newcomer, unsure of himself and lonely in his interaction with his classmates. The second segment replays these scenes to show what might have been done to make David feel welcome. Suitable for lower secondary level.
